title: Gen Pop (w/ Judd Apatow, Pete Holmes, Shane Gillis, Bobby Kelly & Mike Finoia)
description: Judd Apatow and Pete Holmes join the show and talk about Bill Cosby adapting to jail. Shane Gillis discusses Trump celebrating the Clemson Team with McDonalds. Bobby Kelly and Mike Finoia discuss Louis C.K. with Big Jay & DJ Lou can’t get backstage at MSG with Sebastian Maniscalco.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
content:encoded: Judd Apatow and Pete Holmes join the show and talk about Bill Cosby adapting to jail. Shane Gillis discusses Trump celebrating the Clemson Team with McDonalds. Bobby Kelly and Mike Finoia discuss Louis C.K. with Big Jay & DJ Lou can’t get backstage at MSG with Sebastian Maniscalco.
